properties.description: It is free to join and use the library and everyone is welcome. Alongside free access to books, computers, casual and study seating, the Library runs a host of free activities for adults and children including Connect Over A Cuppa community coffee morning on Wednesday 10am-11.30am, there is no charge for refreshments.
